name: Click Eternal
description:
Click and upgrade until it is done.

KNOWN BUGS

  • Pain elemental glory kill is larger than all the other glory kills
  • Buying divinity machine takes your money but doesn't give you anything

UPDATE 2

  • Settings!
    • Low quality mode (disables gif)
    • Cheat buttons
    • Mute music
    • Reset data
  • Better gui
  • Double the upgrades
  • More glory kills added to the gif
  • More music
  • Data now saves!
  • Fixed glitch where you couldn't buy The Icon even if you have enough money
  • Fixed glitch where money would flash between your previous amount
  • Added windows download
